content: Yes, that's correct. Hitarth Parikh is the founder of Hyperlab, which is a sports tech startup that focuses on developing cutting-edge technologies for sports training and rehabilitation. The company's flagship product, Helios, is a virtual target projection system designed to enhance athletes' courtcraft, footwork, reflexes, and agility. Hyperlab has patented Helios in India and filed patent applications in other countries, and it has received a grant of 45 lakhs from the Gujarat government to support its product development.
